description:
Learn what a fellow psoriasis sufferer did to change her life and live her life psoriasis free. Dr Irene Prantalos, a Chinese medicine practitioner was covered from head to toe with psoriasis. She spent decades trying to understand what triggers psoriatic disease and how to alter diet and lifestyle factors to relieve the pain and embarrassment from this disease.

In this course you will be:

* Guided through a cleanse (that includes delicious anti-inflammatory meals).

* Receive 8 weeks of meal plans and shopping lists to heal your psoriatic disease from the inside out.

* Find out how to develop a positive mindset.

* Discover all the treatments available for you to try and heal your skin and joints from this challenging auto-immune disease.

* Shown how to effectively shop for everything from personal hygiene items, food, clothing and many more, to heal psoriatic disease.

A complex disease made easy to understand and manage through these 5 Steps to Live Psoriasis Free.
title: 5 Steps to Live Psoriasis Free
